1.content:
Quiet... that is all that is heard in the pod, as the cleansing goo cleans and feeds the upcoming child to be born. A normal changing would leave his or her pod within a few weeks of the pod's creation, but a certain pod which was well know to the other changlings, to have been there for at least a year. The pod, was made by the leader of the Hive, Queen Chrysalis and had been quietly sitting with the other pods as time went pass. Many of the changlings wondered if the child was dead but none would touch the pod and disobey their queen since the Pod was marked as her replacement.

During the wait, Queen Chrysalis had another changling pod made, this one to test if her recent changlings would take longer to form. Alas, this changling emerged from his pod with a confident smile on his face in as little at a few days. From that point on he was groomed for his spot on the throne that belonged to the first pod, which waited quietly and watched the events in front of it.

This changling male was named Metamorphosis, and he was loved by all other changlings. As he grew in the upcoming months, the changlings saw what he truly was. He was brash and ill-tempered, adopting his mother's most unpleasant traits as his own as well as her beliefs. He hated the creatures who roamed in the daylight, being so cheerful when his own changlings were suffering to survive. In this time period, the changlings were forced to starve in order to appease the alicorn known as Celestia of the Sun.

But this is not about Metamorphosis. And as the story went, it was only on a red moon a year later that the pod which had been laying quietly for so long finally split open and a young and small changling female crawled out into the night. The once famous podling was now nothing more than the unwanted remembrance of a failure, but Chrysalis accepted the changling as hers to grow into the weapon she needed against the world that loomed over their heads. This changling was never given a true name but was named Ceka as it was the first word she was able to speak.

This is her story, what she will face is horrible and will test her limits. Pick how you will see her story told.
1.title: The start of a tragic story

choices: With Ceka in the Servant's hold
A talk with Chrysalis, to Ceka
A talk with Chrysalis, to Metamorphosis
11.content:
To say that her first few weeks under the care of her mother Chrysalis were calm would be a lie. From the day Chrysalis accepted Ceka as her own, Ceka was put to work like a serf in pony history. Every day she would work her tiny body with no assistance from the moon rising to the sun rising later on. Every day was a struggle for her but it was required of all changlings to aide in the survival of the hive, this was the code of a changling.

However, the truth was that ever changling worked, except for the royality. So Chrysalis and Metamorphosis watched the others work to promote their daily lifestyle, which would feed a normal pony town for weeks. Ceka noticed this and asked why this was so to Chrysalis and Metamorphosis, but both simply got angry at her for questioning the order of the hive.

Not only did the young hatchling work, she was also treated as one of the servants, constantly being treated like scum and never like the princess she is. Her brother Metamorphosis was the one who promoted this concept, using his sister as his personal assistant for everything he wanted. When Ceka once declined to serve him since she was tired, he slapped her and told her that she should be grateful to serve the "purest" of the changlings.

But as all stories begin, they certain grow into something more.
11.title: Newborn

151.content:
3 years...3 damned years...

The day where that one changling brought hell to the nation of Equestria. The Ponies of the nation have fought bravely to defend their home and have been able to hold back the Changling Empire from taking over Equestria. The Changlings have taken over two areas towards the south and captured their citizens and made them into sustanities. I do not recall how the war began but, when the princess of Equestria, Celestia, declared war on the changlings, Princess Luna's son and Celestia's alicorn nephew, Hypon Moonstone, vanished from the castle and has not been found since. Many have feared the worst, but Luna knows that her son is alive, but keeps it secret from the others, not wanting to cause chaos amongst her people and dear sister.

With Prince Hypon, who was also the head of the royal gaurd, gone; Celestia chose to appoint one of her strongest gaurds as the head of the Equestrian Military who was named as of now Commander Blitz Lighting, a very stubborn white pegasus mare with a blue and gold mane whose pink eyes frighten most of her old guards. She has lead the Equestrian Military into battle and has defended the cities expertly, but boasts herself stronger than the lost prince who fled from Canterlot because he did not want to go into this war and also spread the rumor that Hypon committed suicide.

As a watcher of what has happened, I cannot say if anything that has been true or lies, but all I can say is as the weather begins to change from summer to fall and then fall to winter, a grand storm of events shall come; the only question that needs to be answered is: will it be in the favor of the changlings who seek to conquer, or in the favor of the Equestrian nation, who seek to take back their homeland and bring back prosperity?
151.title: When peace fails...

1511.content:
Meanwhile the Changling hive, Princess Ceka was watching the hive prepare for the upcoming war. Ceka had lost her emotional side and was cold and distant from all who tried to get near her. She was forced to watch her brother Metamorphosis become general and her mother leader of the war. She was forced to keep all of their changlings in order as temporary leader.

The rumors of her friend Hypon Moonstone suicide reached her and she mourned his loss in quiet but continued her task. This was easy since the hive were under her control and obeyed theirs true ruler Chrysalis.

15112.content:
The sun rose over the land of the Equestrian nation and the pony soldiers who hid in the woods came trotting out in formation, marching onto the plains that lay before the fallen city of Appleloosa, one of the first few cities to fall to the changlings. The changlings guards watched from thier towers and blew their horns, signaling the troops of an attack. The changling army then fluttered over the walls of the hive and began to meet the charging pony army...

The day went on, the endless slaughter of both kinds, pony and changling, continued and shattered all the silence of the southwestern plain. The blood of the warriors poisoned the once fertile ground and the corpses of both groups laid. The pony warriors fled before nightfall rose over the mountains far away. As they watched their opponents run away, the changlings chuckled as they saw their enemies run in fear and left the corpses untouched as a warning to the other attempts to take the city.

In Canterlot, with Blitz Lightning

A loud sound and shout rang through the barracks of soliders, "Their is no words I can say that would be appropriate for this time. We have lost less than a quarter of Equestria to those scum and no kind has brought aid to our cause. The Griffens stay in their kingdom, minding their own business and we are alone in this war with only our own citizens." Blitz Lightning began to pace in circles around the map that laid in the center of the room. As Blitz paced, one of Luna's top gaurds; who was named, Ranger, and one of the very few who believed their prince still trots pondered, "If our leader wasn't one who was illtempered, we would probably be able to seek aid from the other kingdoms. It was not he who was able to gain the help from the Crystal Kingdom, it was Princesses Luna and Twilight. Our captain has done nothing but fail our people with innocent blood shed across the once fertile fields."

Back in the outskirts of Appleloosa
The soliders carried their wounded on the backs of the buffaloes who helped aid the pony nation.

1511221.content:
As Ceka walked through the moonlit forest, she could see something bright inside the woods that her gaurds haven't noticed yet. Quickly, Ceka said to her gaurds, "Turn back and head to the hive, I have to use the restroom, I shall not be long and I will rejoin you soon." Knowing not to question the royalty, the guard walked down the path towards the hive. Ceka then headed towards the strange and bright light inside the forest, trying to be as quiet as possible. Ceka used the shadow of night to evade detection from any eyes the light may show. Ceka then noticed as she got closer that the light that it was a small campfire and someone either very brave or foolish was resting near the outskirts of the Changling Hive. Ceka had her small dagger if she needed to defend herself, but saw no one inside the area of light yet.

She heard a small rustling and light humming as someone who was coming from the other side of where she was. Ceka saw a black hooded figure appear out of the shadow and humming ceased as he began to monolog, while heading to his stone seat near the fire. "Where is the horse and the captain? Where is the horn that was blowing? Where is the bright mane of a young mare flowing, and is the harp on the harpstring? Where is the springtime harvest and the tall corn that grow?" The figure then sat down onto the stone seat and continued, "They have passed like the rain on the mountain and like the wind that crosses the meadow; the day have gone down in the West behind the hills into shadow. How did it come to this?" The figure then summoned a nearby wooden pipe and puffed lightly, only to gently place it down again.

Ceka recognized the voice of the figure but without a face, she couldn't put a face on this figure and she took one back step to only to hear the sound of a breaking twig. The figure then spoke again, "If you come to kill me, it shall lead to no avail, but if you are friendly; come into the light so I can see who has approached my camp and honor you like a guest." Ceka did not know what to do, but after a quick glance of the camp; she did not see any weapon that the figure could use to hurt her, so she slowly stepped into the full light of the fire, not expecting what would next. Then the figure then said, "Evening, young princess of changings, Princess Ceka, it has been many days since we last met, but that was on better terms. You must be hungry."

151122121.content:
(Note: All Lord of the Rings lines, names, and qoutes are of the credit of J.R.R Tolkien, one of my favorite authors)

The figure then took a quick breath and then spoke, "The better question would be who I was." Ceka was confused by what the figure said and then he added, "I was once a pony of great valor, only to be casted away as a rumor or a myth. But now I have returned to bring peace and harmony back to the nation." Ceka then was about to speak but then the figure dropped his hood, revealing his identity.

Ceka then saw an solid white pony with golden yellow eyes and a unicorn horn protruding from his forehead. The pony's mane was a light grey with parts of darker grey and his face had a kind and welcoming smile. The pony then took off the black cloak to reveal a sliver cloak under it and his white coat and alicorn wings. The pony then said, "Hypon Moonstone, that was my name, but now, I am called White Star."
151122121.title: The Prince Returns...

If this is a joke Changling, it would be best to admit it now before I have you killed. I know Hypon Moonshine is dead, he killed himself when this war started and I don't take kindly to those who mock him."
1511221212.title: Ceka doubts her eyes

15112212121.content:
"Through pain, hatred, and the verge of war." White Star began. "I flew away from the place I called home; Canterlot. After of the events that transpired after the failed peace summit, I flew toward the snowy mountains of the west, where the first summit amongst my kind was held and searched the grand library of the Ancients, where one book talked about a hidden place where only few can enter. What was in it was not told, but I knew that it had something special about it. I fled north and entered a region near the dragon's cave and enter a cave that the book foretold. I entered into the cave and fought the beast that almost destroyed the first summit, a band of windigo spirits with all that I could muster. I then saw a grand and wondrous sight, something no book nor legend nor tale could describe. After I defeated those spirits, a white tall alicorn stallion found me in his cave and brought me into his sanctorum. This pony did not tell me his name or his title, but he was very skilled in magic. He already knew of what I was going to say about my predicament. He trained me, cleansed me of my wounds from the spirits, and told me of what I must do to save Equestria's ponies, the Changling's, and all the other nations that live near us. And for that, he made my coat white and made look different to remind me of my mission. Even my cutie mark which was a blue shield and blue crescent moon was changed into something new and this form I must take until my mission is a success. Hypon never died, he was reborn into what you see, Ceka."

White Star then got up from his stone seat and walked over to a nearby bag, revealing that his cutie mark was changed as well. White Star's cutie mark had a orange round circle with eight edges making it look like a sun and the inside the circle lay a crescent grey moon along with a single white star.
15112212121.title: What really happened...

151122121211.content: "It seems farfetched White Star, you need more physical proof to make me believe. Also, you may want to hurry, my guards will start looking for me soon and they love taking ponies prisoners." Ceka said as looked at White Star.

153.content: It was a glorious winter morning, the sun was still waiting to be risen as the three changling royalty flew with a pair of the guards for each changling as they trotted towards the Canterlot Castle Gates. Metamorphosis wasn't very happy on being at a peace assembly in Canterlot. Queen Chrysalis wasn't happy either, but wanted to see if her hive could finally live in peace with the ponies. Ceka remained quiet, but hopeful about these peace assemblies that were going to take a couple of days. The Royal Guard Ponies opened the doors for the changling royalty and lead them into the Throne Room where a large table sat in the middle of the room with eight chairs; three on one side, five on the other. Each place on the table had a nametag for where each pony and changling would sit: on the left, Queen Chrysalis was in the middle, Metamorphosis on the right and Ceka on the left. On the pony side: Celestia, Luna, and Cadence had the Middle Seats, Twilight was on the right side, facing Metamorphosis, and on the left, near Luna, sat the nametag of her son, Prince Hypon Moonstone, who would face Ceka.
153.title: The Chance for Peace

"Be quiet, you know our demands, either they give us two thirds of Equestria to use as we please, or we will win this fight. Our empire requires pony emotions to surive and if this does not give us our demands, we will take it by force." Queen Chrysalis said as her son Metamorphosis nods. "They kept us oppressed for so long, it is time they got what they deserved." Metamorphosis said with his edge of arrogance.

154.content:
(Blood and Violence will be in this story, you have been warned)

A long time ago, on a night in Ponyville

Hypon Moonstone, the young alicorn prince and child of Princess Luna, was walking through Ponyville after he visited the Ponyville Orphanage and gave a quite generous donation to them as he knew how it felt to raised without any parents and hoped that his donation would help the young fillies and colts would finally find the parent they were destined to have. Hypon then stopped in the center of Ponyville and looked up at the clear midnight sky, saw the moon and cracked a little smile and said, "The moon has risen and my mother is watching over the dreams of her subjects." A slight breeze was blowing through Hypon's mane a slight buzzing was heard and then Hypon added in a sigh, "Only if we all knew peace," Hypon then turned around to see the face of someone we consider a rival, Prince Metamorphosis, now a fully grown changling prince, and then heard his rebuke, "If we all knew peace, then all would be treated fairly."

Hypon then smiled at Metamorphosis and said, "But if all were treated fairly, the Equestrian Economy would plummet and the nation would be in shambles." Metamorphosis then growled, "Better a nation be in shambles than serve hypocritical leaders who offer peace and show only chaos." Hypon knew that Metamorphosis was trying to anger him and calmly responded by saying, "But which is better, the false leader or a tyrant?" Metamorphosis then snapped when he heard Hypon's final word and knew he was referring to his mother as the 'tyrant' and then charged at Hypon who kept his smile.

Hypon then sidestepped against Metamorphosis's attack and then gave a swift kick to his side, causing Metamorphosis to fall over and get angrier when he got up and charged at him again, only to end up locking horns with Hypon again as Hypon added, "You are very predictable, Meta." Metamorphosis then brashly grinned and then retorted, "Were you expecting this?" Then a small green spark from Meta's connected to Hypon's, giving Hypon a quick, but powerful shock that made him fall over into a paralytic state and then Metamorphosis then quickly said, "You shall regret what you said," and gave a powerful kick to Hypon's face, knocking him out.

Ceka pops out of the shadow
15422.content: Hypon then fixed his nose, wincing in his pain, and then said, "So, do you think this will bring peace, taking me into the center of the Changling Empire and holding me hostage for ransom? Hypon then made sure that he still had his bag on his back which didn't have anything else in it except some paper, ink, and a set of quills, which meant they took the water and food he brought.
15422.title: Call out to the cold eyes in the shadow

154221.content: "If not peace, surrender." A familiar voice said as a Queen Chrysalis stepped out of the shadows. " You are their face for a new empire, so either they give up and step down, or they will permanently lose you."
154221.title: Chrysalis pops out of the shadow

choices: Chrysalis heads back into the shadow
1542212.content: Hypon just then laughed while in pain and said, "You really think I'm the face of the new empire? I'm flattered, but I'm just the one behind the scenes, just like my mother. Twilight Sparkle is the face, I am the neck. You will never succeed with this plan and they won't lose me, only you and your son will lose me."
1542212.title: Next

15422122.content: "Think what you like, but the fact is that you will remain here until we drain you of your life." Queen Chrysalis said as she heads back into the shadows, leaving Metamorphosis and Hypon alone.
15422122.title: Chrysalis heads back into the shadow

choices: Two changling drones appear outside his cell
154221222.content:
After Metamorphosis left Hypon alone in his cell, Hypon dusted himself off and then grabbed a nearest sheet of paper and summoned an ink well and quill and began to write in endless thought. Hypon wasn't expecting all of this to happen this morning, but he kept thinking of the advantages of this, even if it looked bleak and dimly lit; Hypon still had strong faith that he would be found before the worst. The quill then began to write the following words:
Time

Time, our greatest enemy,

However, Hypon then stopped there and began to ponder about what he just wrote and then placed all the items back into his bag and leaned against a corner of a pillar that he thought was comfortable and waited for the next guest who would visit his cell and taunt the high mighty alicorn prince and son of Princess Luna, heir to her throne.
154221222.title: Even when surrounded by night, Light still gleams

1542212221.content: Hypon then saw the one changling he didn't expect to come by, a small female changling who looked more shy than the others.
1542212221.title: Ceka appears outside Hypon's cell

15422122212.content: Hypon didn't know who this changling but still kept his gaurd up, not knowing if she was hostile or not, and then said, "Evening."
15422122212.title: Hypon doesn't know her

154221222122.content: The female changling was silent and was observing Hypon with a very shy demeanor that reminded him of Twilight when she was experimenting. Hypon then noticed the tray she held, of what looked like his food.
154221222122.title: She is silent

1542212221222.content: Hypon then said, "You don't have to be shy around me, Miss." Hypon then moved close to the edge of the cell and then looked at the young changling female and look at her with his blue prince eyes and looked gently at her.
1542212221222.title: Try to get her talking

15422122212221.content: Despite Hypon's kindness, the changling female was more shy and looked fearful of Hypon. She broke eye contact with Hypon and pushed the tray of food until it was just in Hypon's reach. The changling female then fled, quickly locking the door behind her.
15422122212221.title: That didn't help

15422122212222.content: The changling female then spoke very softly in her native tongue, which would've stumped Hypon but he managed to translate. " I have... never seen your kind. The emotions coming from you... it is unbelievable..." Hypon then noticed that she was starting to feed uncontrollably on his emotions.
15422122212222.title: She spoke

info.brief_description: The messed up story of a young changling who only wanted peace.
info.description:
This is a My Little Pony fan story, if you do not like the My Little Pony franchise, this is not the story for you. If you do like the franchise, then you are welcome to read and/or comment in an email to me.

This is the story of a changling, but not just any changling. This changling is one who is born without a name and will be nothing unless she proves herself worthy of her clan. Her life story is one of pain and neglect, forced to survive on her own, facing all odds from the world around her and that of her own family.
info.pretty_title: The story of Ceka the Changling
